Turn everything off, lock all the doors and gates and leave for the day
Print out next day arrival and departure sheet and finish any loose ends.
Move any daycare dogs that are still in yards to the late pick up kennels as they become available
Do a final walk thru checking the med binder, gates, latches, blankets/beds, buckets and hoses.  Close up the barn making sure the hoses and fans are off.
Excuse staff at 5pm for the day and finish any loose ends that may not have been able to have been finished due to time.
Open office, turn on computers and security camera monitor
Squeegee Puddles and do court yard poop check
Go to little dogs and check on them. Make sure all departing dogs who are supposed to get a bath are on the sheet.
Unlock gates as you go
Unlock and open the barn, turn on the barn computer. Make sure all dogs who are supposed to get a bath are on the list.
Turn on the lights and fans in the barn and do a walk through checking on all the dogs as you go. Make sure to turn on the water to the hose and turn off the heater/ac
Head to the cocker barn and collect the buckets you need for the social and non social yards
Turn on the social side hose. Put buckets into all the social yards and fill with water
Put the buckets into the senior yard and then head to the non social side placing buckets and filling as you go.  Turn on the non social side hose.
Move all early drop offs daycare dogs into yards while you are working on placing buckets
Receive from customers any early drop off dogs that arrive while you are placing bucket
Head into office and check the one on one binder to see if any dogs who are having baths in there and make sure there is a note for the bathers on the bath list
Print the bath list
Greet staff as they arrive and let them know about any important information they need to know.
Assist the office staff with the morning rush making notes on: issues being reported, new dog evaluations, or special 1 on 1 dogs that need a friend.
Check on all the staff during their morning duties and lead them thru tasks that they are doing wrong so they know the proper way of doing them.
Make sure all day employees are taking lunches when they are supposed to
Check in with staff to see what has been accomplished and what needs your attention, don't forget to check in on the groom shop as well.
Help where there is need to make sure everything stays on track to begin pm duties.
Assist office with the afternoon rush. Instruct and make notes of any issues that may be discovered while putting away dogs.
